name: ひじみこ ～ Letters of Transcendental Desires
name_original: ひじみこ ～ Letters of Transcendental Desires
description:
Once upon an autumn day, a conflict emerged between the Buddhist and the Taoist forces. The cause of the war was so insignificant that everyone forgot it the very next day, but it didn’t diminish the fervour of the both sides. What will it lead to? No one knows... (Spoiler: all ways lead to love)

ひじみこ ～ Letters of Transcendental Desires is a short game made for Touhou Pride Game Jam 3

Gameplay

A tower defence game with VN parts where the player should let certain enemies pass at some point.
